ABOUT ME

My name is Miloš Branković and I am a full stack web developer. My first wish was to master frontend technologies but in the process of learning I fell in love with web programing in general and started exploring the backend side of web applications so the journey led me along the full stack path.

C# as a programming language and other technologies running on C# are my choice. They are modern, strongly typed, stable and give you power to create amazing web apps.
Clean and well organised code makes me satisfied and I always want to write my code as clean and as maintainable as possible, as it gives long-term benefits.

I love experimenting with technologies I am already good at and I also search for growth outside of the comfort zone and find it exciting to learn new tools and technologies I still don't master.

SKILLS

PROJECTS

MY BUGTRACKER

This is a bug tracking app I created to make my personal development easier and more organized. The backend for this web app is developed with .Net Core MVC and WebApi.

The app is used to create Tickets/Bugs for Project a developer is worikng on. There are several roles with different allowed access. Admins and Project Managers can create projects and assign developers to those projects. Users with developer role can create Tickets, comment, close and edit tickets they created.

Click "Login as demo user" option from the home screen to see some of the app's functionalities with some sample data.

C#
.NET Core
Entity framework Core
MSSQL
Code First Workflow
jQuery
Bootstrap
HTML
MY WALLET

This web app is used for managing and tracking personal finances and budget. The backend is built using ASP.NET WebApi and the frontend is built with Angular framework. JSON web tokens are used to authorize web requests.

After registering, the user than creates one or more accounts to track finances. Insert, update or delete income and expense records on different accounts and track the changes with nicely visualised graphs.

Click "Login as tester" option from the home screen to see some of the app's functionalities with some sample data.

C#
ASP.NET Web Api
Entity framework
MSSQL
Angular
TypeScript
Bootstrap
HTML
MOVIE DATABASE

This is a web app that uses a database populated with about 250 movies. ASP.NET MVC pattern is used to build the app's functionality. The user first needs to register and login to access the full functionality.

There is an option to search the movies by movie name or genre, like, comment and add to watchlist. There is a special admin role that allows admins to manage database, i.e. create, update and delete movies and also manage other users and their roles.

C#
ASP.NET MVC
Entity framework
MSSQL
jQuery
Ajax
Bootstrap
HTML
BLACKJACK

This is a classical casino game developed with React components and Redux for state management (managing deck of cards, shuffling, dealing, managing bets...). The app is styled with Scss and everything is bundeled up with Webpack.

As a player, you start with 3000$ 'cash'. Play as long as you want and refresh the page when you lose money.
Enjoy!

React.js
Redux
JavaScript
SCSS
HTML
Webpack
REACT WEATHER APP

This web app was developed using React.js and React Router. It has 3 routes: one for current locaiton weather, one for searching for any city, and one for weather in Serbia in five cities. Weather data is retrieved from the Open weather map API.

The background changes according to the weather in current location (if the user alows location info). When a user clicks on a city name, he can get detailed wheather info for five days in a chart. The chart data shows weather data for every 3 hours in the next five days, as well as temperature and precipitation curves.

React.js
React Router
AJAX
JavaScript
Chart.js
SCSS
HTML
Webpack
SERBIAN CULTURAL MONUMENTS

This web app uses a little bit of backend with Python's Flask framework and SQL commands to retrieve some data from the database. The data for this website was retrieved by web scraping with a simple script in node.js. The source was official website that holds all of the Serbian cultural monuments data.

The map is displayed thanks to the Yandex maps API. The user can search for monuments, add placemarks to the map, get additional info about monuments and get directions to the monuments.

The app uses Serbian language and both latin and cyrillic scripts can be used for searching.

React.js
AJAX
JavaScript
Bootstrap
HTML
Python-Flask
SQL
Webpack
TIC-TAC-TOE

This game was developed using React.js. It is a well-known game students play on boring school classes.

The player can choose to play against a computer or against another player.

React.js

REACT CALCULATOR

This is a simple calculator developed using React.js. It is adapted for use with keyboard and mouse. The calculator utilizes formula logic and observes order of operation precedence.

You can work with decimal and also negative numbers. There are also options for clearing entry and deleting wrongly inputted characters.

React.js
JavaScript
SCSS
HTML
Webpack
WIKIPEDIA VIEWER

This app uses Wikipedia API to search for articles. Wikipedia returns up to 10 matching results. The user can see title of the article, picture if there is any, and intro text from the article.

jQuery
AJAX
JavaScript
